name: Mermaid's Story: The Revengeance of Sasuke Sarutobi
name_original: Mermaid's Story: The Revengeance of Sasuke Sarutobi
description:
Mermaid's Story: The Revengeance of Sasuke Sarutobi is an action game developed by oywand. It came out on 08-06-2018.
You can play Mermaid's Story: The Revengeance of Sasuke Sarutobi on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
